p: Total viable counts were fulfilled in Plate Count Agar for 48 hr at 30°C. Pseudomonas spp. were incubated for 24–48 hr at 23°C on Cetrimide Fucidin Cephaloridine agar. Enterobacteriaceae count was done with Violet Red Bile Glucose agar using the overlay method after incubation for 24 hr at 37°C. Lactic acid bacteria (LAB) were enumerated by de Man–Rogosa–Sharpe agar (MRS agar) supplemented with 0.1 g/L cycloheximide after incubation for 5 days at 25°C under anaerobic conditions (Alizadeh Sani, Ehsani, & Hashemi, 2017). Psychotropic bacteria were determined using King Agar after incubation for 48 hr at 21°C. For the bacterial count, dilutions were prepared for each bacterium and plated on PALCAM agar and EMB agar for L. monocytogenes and E. coli O157:H7, respectively.
